frontmatter.description: Have you ever ran into flaky tests? How about tests which pass but should not have? This is a story about how we wen't about finding these dangerous tests in a suite of over 13,000 tests and what tooling we've built to prevent them from coming back. Hopefully our story and tooling can help you on your own team, big or small.
frontmatter.title: Jest in Strict Mode â€“ Finding and Preventing Flaky Tests
